entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
